verses.verse: But it happened <S%H3117>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> in the time of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> that <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> with a young <S%H1423>goat;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will go <S%H935>in<s%> to my <S%H802>wife<s%> into the <S%H2315>room.<s%>" But her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>wouldn't<s%> allow him to go <S%H935>in.<s%>

Her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I most <S%H559>certainly<s%> <S%H559>thought<s%> that you had <S%H8130>utterly<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H5414>her;<s%> therefore I gave her to your <S%H4828>companion.<s%> <S%H6996>Isn't<s%> her younger <S%H269>sister<s%> more beautiful than <S%H2896>she?<s%> Please take her, instead."
<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6471>them,<s%> "This time I will be <S%H5352>blameless<s%> in regard of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H6213>when<s%> I harm <S%H7451>them.<s%>"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3920>caught<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7776>foxes,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3940>torches,<s%> and <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H2180>tail<s%> to <S%H2180>tail,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> between every <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails.<s%>

When he had <S%H1197>set<s%> the <S%H3940>brands<s%> on <S%H784>fire,<s%> he let them <S%H7971>go<s%> into the standing <S%H7054>grain<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and burnt <S%H1197>up<s%> both the <S%H1430>shocks<s%> and the standing <S%H7054>grain,<s%> and also the olive <S%H2132>groves.<s%>

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H559>this?<s%>" They said, <S%H8123>"Samson,<s%> the <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law of the <S%H8554>Timnite,<s%> because he has <S%H3947>taken<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> her to his <S%H4828>companion.<s%>" The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> her and her <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H518>them,<s%> "If you <S%H6213>behave<s%> like <S%H2063>this,<s%> surely I will be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of <S%H310>you,<s%> and after that I will <S%H2308>cease.<s%>"

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H7785>hip<s%> <S%H5921>and<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter:<s%> and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5585>cleft<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam.<s%>
Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in <S%H3896>Lehi.<s%>

The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why have you come <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H559>us?<s%>" They said, "We have come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he has done to <S%H6213>us.<s%>"

Then <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> down to the <S%H5585>cleft<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H3045>"Don't<s%> you know that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over <S%H6213>us?<s%> What then is this that you have done to <S%H559>us?<s%>" He said to <S%H6213>them,<s%> "As they did to <S%H6213>me,<s%> so have I done to them."

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3381>him,<s%> "We have come down to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> that we may deliver you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>" <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7650>them,<s%> "Swear to me that you will not fall on me <S%H6293>yourselves.<s%>"

They <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H631>"No;<s%> but we will bind you <S%H631>fast,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but <S%H4191>surely<s%> we will not <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H631>you.<s%>" They bound him with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes,<s%> and brought him <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

When he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3896>Lehi,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> <S%H7125>as<s%> they met <S%H7307>him:<s%> and the Spirit of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> on <S%H5688>him,<s%> and the ropes that were on his <S%H2220>arms<s%> became as <S%H6593>flax<s%> that was <S%H1197>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H612>bands<s%> <S%H4549>dropped<s%> from off his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

He <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H2961>fresh<s%> <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and struck a <S%H505>thousand<s%> men <S%H376>therewith.<s%>

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "With the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> <S%H2565>heaps<s%> on <S%H2565>heaps;<s%> with the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> I have <S%H5221>struck<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>"

It <S%H3615>happened,<s%> when he had made an end of <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that he cast <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> Ramath <S%H7437>Lehi.<s%>

He was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6770>thirsty,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H5414>given<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and now shall I <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised?<s%>"

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1234>split<s%> the hollow <S%H4388>place<s%> that is in <S%H3895>Lehi,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H8354>it.<s%> When he had drunk, his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and he <S%H2421>revived:<s%> therefore its <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> En <S%H5875>Hakkore,<s%> which is in <S%H3896>Lehi,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
He <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
